--api-group=''.Description: Limit to resources in the specified API group.

--cached=false.Description: Use the cached list of resources if available.

--namespaced=true.Description: If false, non-namespaced resources will be returned, otherwise returning namespaced resources by default.

--no-headers=false.Description: When using the default or custom-column output format, don't print headers (default print headers).

--sort-by=''.Description: If non-empty, sort list of resources using specified field. The field can be either 'name' or 'kind'.

--verbs=[].Description: Limit to resources that support the specified verbs.
